Disclaimer

The Code of Jewish Law Redux / Reduced - A Jewish WikiDeed.com found within the following pages is not to be relied upon as a primary source. There was no external fact-checking or consultation with anything or anyone before publication. This was a solitary effort and I am accountable for what is inside its pages.

People study this subject and these rules for centuries. I did not study it at all.

When in doubt, consult a rabbi or see the original source.
